sequence:
Zara Character Story - Storia di Rosa

<size=45>Chapter 4: Afternoon Chat</size>

scripts.say: I brought lunch today. Apparently the Sakura girls call this kind of lunchbox a "bento".
Want to eat together?
When lunchtime rolled around, Zara and I stayed in the office to share the bento.
So, I got invited to one of those Royal Navy tea parties once, and had a pretty good time. I wonder if they have to orchestrate something like that...
Eh... they don't? And they throw one of these almost every day...? Those Royal Navy girls really are something.
Oh, you know how Cavour and Cesare are always trying to one-up each other?
They might look that way, but they're closer than anyone else.
Zara was the talkative sort. There was nothing she couldn't squeeze a conversation out of.
We spent our time discussing the fleet and her homeland, the Sardegna Empire, when suddenly...
Commander, can I ask you a question?
Gun to your head, would you rather have a hardworking girl like Carabiniere or a warm and gentle lady like Trento?
Come on, spit it out! I promise not to tell anyone. Just between you and me.
I had been placed in a difficult position.
I had no idea why, but it somehow felt like my life was at a crossroads...
So you like them more honest and hardworking, huh Commander?
But you know there are some issues with that type. Like, for example, if you're going out on a date, she might end up fretting over her outfit only to show up hours late.
At the restaurant, she could waste a few hours debating the nutritional value of each menu item. When you want to take a picture, she might end up spending hours getting the background juuuust right.
And then when it's all said and done, even though the process was kind of a slog, the two of you still had a nice time together. Hooray.
Enough about that though. Shouldn't you be tasting my steak right about now? Open up~
I didn't quite get what she was going for with that hypothetical, but the steak was pretty good...
I had to be careful not to talk with my mouth full.
So you like the caring type, Commander?
Naturally, who wouldn't want a sweet-voiced beauty telling you "everything's going to be okay" whenever you're feeling down? Who wouldn't want someone who washes away all your worries?
The only problem is, giving into that kind of gentle sweetness turns you weak. Before long, you won't even be able to fend for yourself.
I can hear Trento now. "No need to worry. Just let the Commander turn into a little baby. I can take care of everything."
Perhaps you like being babied like that? Here comes the choo-choo train, say ahhn~
It seemed like my descent into an impotent juveline form was a foregone conclusion, but the steak was really good...
I had to be careful not to talk with my mouth full.
You're an excellent naval strategist, but...
I got commanderzoned.
Even though she was playing around, I couldn't help but feel a little hurt.
Oh? Commander, if I didn't know better I'd say you were disappointed. Don't tell me... you were serious?
Don't take it to heart. No matter what happens, I will honor my promise: to bring victory and glory to your fleet. That includes serving you as your secretary ship.
Now now, I can't have my colleagues seeing you with that dejected face. You know how they talk. Open up and let me feed you some of my juicy steak. Ah~
Of course I knew it was just a joke and I shouldn't take it to heart. And the texture of the steak was really delightful...
I had to be careful not to talk with my mouth full.
Talking to you is so much fun, Commander, but we do need to be getting back to work. Let's do this again sometime!
Somehow, I felt like Zara was always two steps ahead of me.
And I can't say I liked that very much.
